title: Jury Finds Ahmaud Arbery Killers Guilty of Federal Hate Crimes
sub_head: Father and son Greg and Travis McMichael and neighbor William Bryan had previously been convicted of murder
body:
A federal jury found three white men who murdered Ahmaud Arbery, a Black man, in their coastal Georgia neighborhood in 2020 guilty of hate crimes and other charges.
The guilty verdict means jurors found that the men acted “because of Mr. Arbery’s race and color,” as federal prosecutors stated in their indictment filed last year.
